name: World Cup - Groups Poster
description:
An A3 poster displaying all 32 teams taking part in the 2014 World Cup, shown in the different groups which were drawn on December 6th 2013. 

Open Edition, hand signed and numbered. Printed on 250gsm paper.
(Please note: This product is unframed)

name: 15 Seasons of Stevie G Poster
description:
A4 poster, featuring 15 Steven Gerrard's, one for each of the season's he has played for Liverpool. Each Gerrard is dressed in the kit from the correct season, with haircuts and captains armbands to reflect each year.

Open Edition, hand signed and numbered. Printed on 250gsm paper.
(Please note: This product is unframed)

name: Gerrard 100 Poster
description:
A4 poster, displaying all 100 of Steven Gerrard's league goals for Liverpool FC, based on the LFC Postcard No8, when Stevie G scored his 100th goal vs Newcastle in the 2-2 draw.

Open Edition, hand signed and numbered. Printed on 250gsm paper.
(Please note: This product is unframed)

name: Shankly Poster
description:
A4 poster celebrating the legend of LFC, Bill Shankly. This design is based on Postcard No3 in the LFC Postcard Series. 

Open Edition, hand signed and numbered. Printed on 250gsm paper.
(Please note: This product is unframed)

name: LFC Postcards - The complete set
description:
You can now pre-pay for the complete set of LFC Postcards. 

Please select the correct option when ordering to confirm if you would like the postcards to be sent each week as individual cards, or if you prefer one bulk package sent out to you in May 2014 (End of Season). 

If you do select the option to have the cards delivered each week then please be aware that your first delivery will include a bulk package of all of the postcards you have missed so far. Then you will receive weekly individual deliveries from that point onwards.

There is a slight price difference in the options to cover additional postage and packing for the weekly option.

options.name: Rest of the World - May delivery
Rest of the World - Weekly delivery

name: LFC Postcards - The Festive Gift Set
description:
This is the ideal Christmas gift for any fellow RED family and friends! To order a set for somebody else simply follow these three easy steps;
 
1. ORDER the FULL SET (those currently available will be sent to your address in order for you to wrap as a gift for Christmas Day)

2. EMAIL us the address of the person who is receiving the gift. This way, we can add their address to our records in order for the rest of the set to be sent direct to them as each new postcard is released.

3. We will then EMAIL you with a voucher that explains all of this, for you to give to the person who is receiving the gift so they know what to expect.

name: LFC Postcard 16/38
description:
Probably the best LFC away performance in recent history saw Liverpool tear Tottenham apart in a brilliant display. Luis Suarez was his usual brilliant self, but it was the team as a whole that really shone. 5 goals were scored and the performances of Henderson, Flanagan, Sterling and Co lit up White Hart Lane as Liverpool's frantic energy was too much for Spurs to handle. 
It seemed only right this week to feature a team celebration, rather than an individual, Im sure you'll all agree!

name: LFC Postcard 15/38
description: After scoring 5 past Norwich last Wednesday, Liverpool netted 4 against an average West Ham side in a match that included 3 own goals, another goal for Luis Suarez and a first Liverpool goal for Mamadou Sakho. This weeks postcard celebrates our newest giant of a centre back with a subtle French themed design as a reference to Sakho's strong Parisian  roots.

name: LFC Postcard 14/38
description:
Luis Suarez produced a performance against Norwich which Steven Gerrard described as one of the best he had ever seen at Anfield. It's hard to put into words how good Suarez was, but phrases like "Out of this World", "Superhuman" and "On another planet" come close to describing his masterclass. With that in mind, a space themed postcard was designed, to pay homage to an incredible world class player!

The coloured stars behind Suarez depict the 13 goals he has scored this season in the league, with each planet colour co-ordinated to match that teams kit colour.

name: LFC Postcard 13/38
description: A weekend to forget for Liverpool as they crashed to a 3-1 defeat away at Hull City. Brendan Rodgers Christmas Tree formation never really got going, and after gifting Hull the first goal via a deflection, Liverpool then went on to give them another present with a disastrous own goal. This is probably just a postcard for the die hard supporters!

name: LFC Postcard 12/38
description:
In one of the most incredible Merseyside Derbies of recent years, Liverpool secured a 3-3 draw with bitter rivals Everton last Saturday at Goodison Park. In a match that literally had everything, Philippe Coutinho, Luis Suarez and Daniel Sturridge got the goals whilst at the other end, Simon Mignolet showed his class with a series of excellent saves.

The postcard design is based on the Beatles famous "Hard Days Night" album cover, a song produced by 4 Liverpool lads who had a massive impact on the city. The 4 Liverpool players who had a massive impact on the final result are the stars of the design, dubbed the "Fab Four" in honour of their impact on the game.

name: LFC Postcard 11/38
description:
Following on from Liverpool's excellent victory against Fulham at Anfield, Postcard 11 in the series celebrates Martin Skrtel's goal with a tattoo themed design. The patterned background is made up of various tattoo style icons that tell the story of an incredible match that saw LFC have 32 shots at goal, Steven Gerrard clocking up 3 assists and Luis Suarez moving into joint top scorer in the league with his 8th goal of the season.

A6 card printed on 400gsm card with a matte effect finish. Price includes postage & packing.

name: LFC Postcard 10/38
description:
PLEASE NOTE: The original design for Postcard No10 had to be removed due to a copyright claim by Transport for London. The new design is a slightly amended version of the original. Any orders made from 1st December 2013 onwards will receive this new version.

Postcard 10 in the series focuses on Liverpool's trip to North London, which saw them come home without any points as Arsenal ran out 2-0 winners. The postcard is based on the iconic London Underground Map, showing various details and stats from the game.

name: LFC Postcard 9/38
description:
Postcard 9 in the series celebrates the brilliance of Luis Suarez, the magician of Merseyside. 

His performance in the 4-1 victory over WBA was described by Brendan Rodgers as "a wonderful performance. Magic." John W. Henry tweeted during the game "Luis. Magician." and even the usually critical British press couldn't hide their admiration for his stunning display.

The postcard itself is A6 in size, printed on 400gsm card with a matte effect finish. Price includes postage & packing.

name: LFC Postcard 8/38
description:
Postcard no 8 in the series so far. 

Ive based the idea on Stevie G's 100th league goal, so each goal is illustrated as a simple icon, showing where the ball hit the back of the net. The red netting signifies a goal at Anfield whilst the white nets show a goal scored away from home.

name: LFC Postcard 7/38
description:
LFC Postcard No 7 of 38. 

The design celebrates Steven Gerrard's goal vs Crystal Palace as he broke the club record for in his 15th consecutive season for the Reds. Inspired by the legendary game of Subbuteo, the postcard shows Gerrard in every kit he has worn in the league for Liverpool since his first goal for the club against Sheffield Wednesday in 1999.

A6 card printed on 400gsm card with a matte effect finish. Price includes postage & packing.

name: LFC Postcard 6/38
description: LFC Postcard No 6 of 38. A6 card printed on 400gsm card with a matte effect finish. Price includes postage & packing.

description: LFC Postcard No 5 of 38. A6 card printed on 400gsm card with a matte effect finish. Price includes postage & packing.

description: LFC Postcard 4 of 38. A6 card printed on 400gsm card with a matte effect finish. Price includes postage & packing.

description: LFC Postcard No3 of 38. A6 card printed on 400gsm card with a matte effect finish. Price includes postage & packing.

name: LFC Postcard 2/38
description: LFC Postcard No2 of 38. A6 card printed on 400gsm card with a matte effect finish. Price includes postage & packing.

description: LFC Postcard No 1 of 38 in the series. A6 card printed on 400gsm card with a matte effect finish.
